attributes.action: Legalise marijuana in the uk by 2021
attributes.additional_details: If it was legal we would also know what we where taking so medical marijuana is safer than getting “skunk” of the streets which could contribute to mental health risks in out society.
attributes.background: If we legalised marijuana it would fund the NHS with an incredible amount, and could also generate over £1bn a year in taxes. Marijuana can also help pain and diseases and it can also help eating disorders.
